pylayers.signal.bsignal.TBsignal.b2u¶

TBsignal.b2u(N)[source]¶

conversion into an uniform signal

Parameters :N : Number of points
Returns :TUsignal :

Examples

>>> from pylayers.signal.bsignal import *
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
>>> x     = np.array( [ 1, 3 , 6 , 11 , 18])
>>> y     = np.array( [ 0,1 ,-5, 8 , 10])
>>> sb    = TBsignal(x,y)
>>> su20  = sb.b2u(20)
>>> su100 = sb.b2u(100)
>>> fi    = plt.figure()
>>> su20.plot(col='k')
>>> su100.plot(col='r')
>>> ti    = plt.title('TBsignal : b2u ')
>>> plt.show()

(Source code, png, hires.png, pdf)
